name: Berry
public_notice: Formerly known as Sound Blockchain Protocol (SBP) with old website https://sbpglobal.io/

description.en: The SBP project provides a solution to tackle the pressing issues facing global entertainment and the donation sector through BERRY, a decentralized platform that alleviates unequal revenue sharing structures. The SBT team will funnel portions of donations made to the SBP platform for social innovation.
